command.text: declare @y1 int, @y2 int, @p1 int, @p2 int select @y1 = min(nam), @y2 = max(nam), @p1 = min(ky), @p2 = max(ky) from hrky select 'this.grid._minYear = ' + ltrim(@y1) + ';this.grid._maxYear = ' + ltrim(@y2) + ';this.grid._minPeriod = ' + ltrim(@p1) + ';this.grid._maxPeriod = ' + ltrim(@p2) + ';active$EmployeeRewardInputFilter(this);' as message return

declare @$lockedDate nvarchar(512), @dateTo smalldatetime select @$lockedDate = case when @@language = 'v' then N'Đã khóa số liệu, kiểm tra lại ngày giới hạn hoặc ngày khóa sổ.' else N'Data is locked, you must modify system locked date.' end select @dateTo = ngay_den from hrky where ky = @ky and nam = @nam if exists(select 1 from dmstt where ngay_ks >= @dateTo) select '' as field, '' as message, 'this.grid._denyNew = this.grid._denyEdit = this.grid._denyDelete = true; this.grid._denyMessage = ''' + @$lockedDate + '''' as script else select '' as field, '' as message, 'this.grid._denyNew = this.grid._denyEdit = this.grid._denyDelete = null; this.grid._denyMessage = ''''' as script

action.text: declare @b varchar(128) select @b = '' if exists(select 1 from hrbp where ma_bp = @ma_bp) select @b = bp_ref from hrbp where ma_bp = @ma_bp select @b as value return
